Adam Bridge

Senior Engineer / Engineering Manager

Email: adam@attbregge.com

About Me

I’m an experienced backend software engineer and manager of small teams with 16 years industry experience in finance and ecommerce. I have worked in a range of roles developing, deploying and supporting mission critical software for leading financial firms and most recently an ecommerce startup. As an engineer, I like thinking from first principles to find practical, elegant solutions that can be implemented with a minimum of fuss. As a manager I lead by example and get my hands dirty. I aim to serve my teams, remove obstacles and give them appropriate responsibility and space to grow. I’m looking for a hands-on technical role that where I can share my enthusiasm for problem solving in an environment of similarly minded people.
